If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message

- ...

- ...

nodes.body:
### PR summary [02c2c5aa81](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/17454/commits/02c2c5aa8165f86334088d9677a4fd556367334f)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ _root_.LinearEquiv.congrQuadraticMap`
`+ _root_.LinearMap.BilinMap.congr₂`
`+ congr₂_refl`
`+ congr₂_symm`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
Could you add these for the bilinear version too?

Do we have a the non-equiv spelling of this? If so, a lemma linking then would be good.

(In the quadratic case `simps` I believe generates such a lemma, but I will check more closely when I'm next at lean)

pullRequest.title: feature(LinearAlgebra/QuadraticForm/Basic): congr₂
